comments:
build I20070625-1500

I was in the sync view (show only incoming changes view selected) and did an "update all". There were 2 conflicts so I selected one and did "override and update". When it finished, the Sync view didn't update (the entry didn't disappear). I tried it again. Then I switched the view to show both incoming and outgoing changes and it disappeared. So I looked in my log file and found the following stack trace.
